lines.text: You think he mighta been a Go Wizard?
Eh? What makes you think that?
Well, there’s those tattoos in the book, right? We can check if he’s got them!
So... go do that, then.
Huh?
Check if he’s got those tattoos. Hop to it!
Hm… maybe that stuff on his face is a hint.
Hm? How do you figure?
Um.
I got nothin’.
Well, keep looking around. You might find something that puts other evidence into context.
Okay, I got it. This guy’s a Go Wizard!
Oh? What makes you so sure?
Check it out- he’s got those tattoos on his face, right?
Hm...
Those tattoos match the tattoos in the Go Wizard’s spellbook! Makes it pretty obvious what he is.
Are you sure that’s not a trick? Could just be facepaint. Go check.
Dude! No way! You want me to rub down a dead guy’s face?
Justice is messy, kid.
If you think I’m gonna-
Ah, I already- already inspected the body, actually.
It’s definitely… it doesn’t come off. Those are tattoos, certainly.
Thank you, forensics lady.
Even though you said we weren't supposed to touch anything, and you just admitted to breaking that rule.
Even though we're not supposed to touch anything, and you just admitted to breaking that rule.
Not that I'm complaining. Saves me having to poke the guy's weird, dead, sort of gaunt face.
So that answers that- the stiff’s a Go Wizard.
Hrm. Alright, then. What’s next?
